title.value: Уровень движения частицы вдоль радиуса мешалки
The level of particle motion along the radius of the stirrer
The level of particle motion along the radius of the stirrer

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Kolonchuk, V.M., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Perednya, V.I., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Scientific and Practical Center for Agriculture Mechanization
Stasyukevich, S.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Producing of animal production requires quick reaction on market demands. Therefore, development of the mechanism, supplying control activation in production technological chain, appears an important direction of animal husbandry management, combining various biological and technical objects, natural factors and their interrelations. One of the most energy-consumptive operations in animal husbandry appears feed mixing in various mixers and interspersion up to homogenous constitution.  The introduction of energy-saving technology on farms and complexes allows reducing expenses for performance of the technological operation. In the article the theoretical calculation, allowing defining of the equation of movement of the particle along the mixer radius of feed-mixing machine is given. The main forces, applied to the particle, are analyzed; main dynamic processes, happening during mixing of feeds, are evaluated.
